ace.concurrency

Class Threads

  • java.lang.Object
    • ace.Ace
      • ace.concurrency.Threads

  • public class Threads
extends Ace
    Utility class for working with threads.

      Gets the specified stack trace element of the current thread.
      static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutorService(int execution)
      Gets an executor service instance with kind will be according to the specified execution type: DEFAULT (-1) will return null UNLIMITED (0) will return a cached thread pool SINGLE (1) will return a single thread pool executor OTHER (*) will return a fixed thread pool that reuses the specified number of threads

      Gets the thread with the specified name if it exists.

      Asynchronically runs the specified runnable instance in the specified amount of separate threads in separate single executor services waiting the specified delay between each thread spawn.

      Asynchronically runs the specified runnable instance in the specified amount of separate threads in separate single executor services waiting the specified delay between each thread spawn and naming threads with the specified name prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutorService

        public static final java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutorService(int execution)
        Gets an executor service instance with kind will be according to the specified execution type: DEFAULT (-1) will return null UNLIMITED (0) will return a cached thread pool SINGLE (1) will return a single thread pool executor OTHER (*) will return a fixed thread pool that reuses the specified number of threads
        Parameters:
        execution -
        Returns:
        an executor service instance

      • createWaiter

        public static final <T> java.util.concurrent.Future<T> createWaiter(long delay,
                                                                    java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Creates a single executor service in which will be submitted an anonymous callable task in which will be waited the specified delay and then will be executed the specified callable task. The routine returns the corresponding future interface instance to evaluate the result of that task.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        delay -
        callable -
        Returns:
        the corresponding future interface instance

      • delayedEvaluation

        public static final java.lang.Boolean delayedEvaluation(long delay,
                                                        Evaluable evaluable,
                                                        java.lang.Object... parameters)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Asynchronically evaluates the specified evaluable interface instance with the specified parameters after the specified delay.
        Parameters:
        delay -
        evaluable -
        parameters -
        Returns:
        true if the evaluation was successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                                                 java.lang.Boolean defaultValue,
                                                                 Evaluable evaluable,
                                                                 java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Asynchronically evaluates the specified evaluable interface instance with the specified parameters after the specified delay inside a Sandbox instance with the specified default value.
        Parameters:
        delay -
        defaultValue -
        evaluable -
        parameters -
        Returns:
        true if the evaluation was successful or the specified default value otherwise
